lines.text: Let me ask you a question. When you were stabbing that vampire in there?
Did you get a little wood?

they don't turn into bats, crosses don't work. Garlic? You wanna try garlic? You could stand there with garlic around your neck and one of these buggers will bend you fucking over and take a walk up your strada-chocolata WHILE he's suckin' the blood outta your neck, all right? And they don't sleep in coffins lined in taffeta. You wanna kill one, you drive a wooden stake right through his fuckin' heart. Sunlight turns 'em into crispy critters.
Can I ask ya somethin, Padre? When I was kickin your ass back there... you get a little wood?
Isn't it beautiful? Something you'll never forget? I know I won't.
[Jack Crow, having been beaten up by Valek, awakens to find himself strangled and tied to the front of his truck; Cardinal Alba appears, having turned to the dark side]

From your expression, I assume you couldn't understand my presence here. I'm sorry to disillusion you, Jack. As one grows old, as death approaches, we begin to question... our fate. And I found mine lacking. "Is there a god? Is there a heaven?" I can no longer answer this for certain. I've witnessed no miracles, had no visions, and the prospect of death terrifies me. I've realized I've only one... alternative, and I made a bargain. With the devil if you wish.
You are truly a pile of dog shit, Cardinal.
That's correct, Jack and I can live with that. After I have given what Valek wants, he will fulfill our bargain. And I will be transformed into one of his... new children. It's beautiful, isn't it?
Eternal Life... Imortality... can change your heart.
... why don't you prove you can kick my ass? Come on, untie me. Come on. Fuckin' pole smokin' fashion victim. Come on over here.
Come on. Five minutes, then you can bite my ass a little. Would you like that, see me all tied up, huh?
Come on. Untie me, you prick!
[Katrina, now a legion of the undead and one of Valek's newest children, appears and laughs evily after finally feeding on Montoya]
Apparently your friend is one of my children now.

Padre... I'm beginning to like you... so don't make me hurt you, OK? Just tell me what you know... I'll buy you a beer and get you laid. Come on. If you don't tell me, I'm gonna have to start cutting on ya.
No, you won't. You're a righteous man, Mr. Crow. Besides I serve a higher master than you. Any secrets I keep are to protect the church and its followers. Part of...

[grabs Father Guiteau and pins him to the wall]
Open your mouth.

[Jack cuts Giuteau's hand with his switchblade knife]
Now listen to me, you fuck! My father kept a secret once. He got bit by a vampire. He kept it a secret from me and my mother. By the fifth day he was turning. That night he attacked my mother and then he came after me. I killed my own father, Padre. I got no trouble killin' you. Last chance.
Open your fucking mouth! Then prepare...
What? Are you ready? Excuse me? What?
Valek - Valek is for an ancient relic, the Cross of Berseires!

[after interogating the padre and getting him to confess]
You're a good man padre... welcome to the team.

[takes tape off Katrina's mouth; sighs]
What's your name? Do you understand what's been happening to you?

[grabs Katrina's head; puts her in strenghold; covers her mouth]
Hey! HEY! Don't fuck with me, honey! I'll snap your neck like a twig! Now nod your head "Yes" or "No". Do you understand what's been happening to you? DO IT!
All right. Now I'm going to explain it to you. First, I'm gonna take my hand off your mouth. You scream...

I took off your clothes. I cleaned you up. I tied you down. I also saved your ass. You been bitten by a vampire. Do you remember the party back at the motel? Big guy, pointy teeth, real shitty breath? Don't worry. It'll all come back soon. A master vampire has a telepathic link to his victims, and you're gonna help us find him. And while he's sleeping, we unleash on his. You're the bait honey. Sorry.
Let me just ask you one thing - after 600 years, how's that dick workin', pretty good?
A master vampire, able to walk in the sunlight, unstoppable. Unless we stop him.
Valek is the original! The source of the disease! The first vampire created by the Catholic Church...
[Montoya checks out a Buick that pulls up]
Hey! Cowboy! Can I help you?
Yeah. I'm gonna borrow your car.
Shut the fuck up or I'll blow your fucking teeth out the back of your head, asshole! Back off!
[a vampire has just snapped a metal cord that was being pulled by Montoya's jeep]
You didn't tell me they could do that!
I didn't *know* they could do that!

[trying to figure out how much the hotel costs]
What's the fucking total, guy?
No, it's my fuckin' mother. Gimme the key.
When did she first bite you?
Two days ago. I still covered your ass!
Yes, you did. I say we owe you two days back. Whatya think, padre?
[Cardinal Alba, performing the ceremony, makes a cut at Jack's leg]

[Just as Cardinal Alba is about to complete the ceremony by burning Jack at the stake, Father Guiteau shoots Alba in the back with a shotgun, killing him in the process. Valek, his followers, and Katrina growl and hiss]

[yells]
Now, what are you gonna do, Valek? You've got nobody to complete your ritual! The sun's starting to rise!

[holds the shotgun to his head]
Try to make me.
Hey, Valek, you're shit outta luck, pal. Give it up!
[Valek grabs a burning torch and attempts to set Jack on fire. Guiteau removes the shotgun from his forehead]
[Valek moves the torch closer to Jack's crotch]

[groans]
Come on, Padre. My nuts are on fire here!
[Valek has beaten up Jack very badly as Montoya & Katrina escape the vampires and Father Guiteau hides in the local bar]

[grabs Jack's head; growls]
Your war is over, Crusader.
What the fuck do you want from me, Valek?
Oh, you hate me so, don't ya? But you made me, Crusader. You hate what you made. You fear it because it is superior to you.
For six hundred years, I've fed on your kind at will!
[Attempts to bite Jack but slowly refuses]
Why don't you just kill me and get it over with?

Because you are needed, Jack. The ceremony is a re-enactment of the original exorcism. It requires the blood of a crusader and his crucifixion upon a burning cross. The climax of the ceremony must coincide with the first rays of the rising sun. Sorry, Jack.
